heading: Sunday
text: Mostly sunny and not as cool. Highs in the upper 60s to low 70s, a few mid-70s in the warmer valleys. Light wind, becoming south near 10 mph in the afternoon, through the Champlain Valley gusts reach 20 mph.

heading: Sunday Night
text: Mostly clear, with a few periods of clouds. Chance of patchy valley fog. Lows from the 40s to low 50s in the Champlain Valley. Light and variable wind, gusts through the Champlain valley pick up to 25 mph.

heading: Monday
text: Morning fog burning off to partly sunny skies, increasing clouds from the west throughout the day. Chance of a few showers in the north and west. Highs mainly in the mid-to-upper 70s.
